title: Breadboard Synthesizer
description: Introductory music engineering project. Breadboard synthesizer representing a single octave keyboard. Run on MATLAB and an internal battery. This was the final project for the Tufts class Music and the Art of Engineering.

title: This Song Takes Me Back: Music Therapy & Alzheimer's
description: Research paper discussing the therapeutic effects of music on patients afflicted with Alzheimer's Disease. This was the final paper for the Tufts class Psychology of Music.

title: Music Theory Trainer
description: VBA project which implements the UI and functionality of a music theory training program. This was the final project for the Tufts class Intro to Computing in Engineering.

title: Orbit Turntable CAD
description: CAD model of the Orbit Turntable created in Google SketchUp. Intermediate project for the Tufts class Intro to Human Factors and Ergonomics.

title: The Vinyl Revival
description: Report and presentation on vinyl records' recent surge in popularity. This was the final paper and project for the Tufts class Technical and Managerial Communication.

title: MilkCrate Music Library Application
description: Interface critique, reactive product design, and product pitch of music library platforms. This was the final project for the Tufts class Engineering Psychology.

title: Strum Buddy Assistive Guitar Tool
description: Assistive technology design of a guitar playing device for disabled individuals. This was the final project for the Tufts class Intro to Human Factors and Ergonomics.

title: BandMate Musician Matching Application
description: UX research process and design of mobile application for band socialization. This was the final project for the Tufts class Human Computer Interaction.

title: BandCamp Product Assessment
description: UX product assessment of the Bandcamp desktop website. This was an intermediate project for the Tufts class Human Computer Interaction.

title: Apportech Universal Gardening Tool
description: Complete UX research study and subsequent product design of a universal gardening device. Final semester-long project for the Tufts class Human Factors in Product Design.

title: Neuromarketing Presentation
description: Group presentation on neuromarketing in the modern world, used for leading a two and a half hour seminar class. Final seminar presentation for the Tufts class Advanced Engineering Psychology.
